cards.name: Voltgor
cards.description: Voltgor is a mythical pokemon that can be found in mountainous environments. It is said to wear ancient armor, a sign of its extraordinary strength. This pokemon is known to live a solitary life, spending most of its days atop the tallest peaks surveying its domain. The best way to catch a glimpse of Voltgor is usually after a storm, as it is known to use its powerful Thunderlash to ward off any intruders.
cards.image_prompt: Voltgor::0 a mythical electric-type pokemon::2.5, wearing ancient armor, in a mountain environment, lightning background, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
